name: Revocation of license or instruction permit upon death of person signing minor's application
text: The examiner of drivers upon receipt of satisfactory evidence of the death of a person who signed the application of a minor for an instruction permit or a license shall cancel the permit or license and shall not issue a new permit or license until such time as a new application duly signed and verified shall be made as required by this part.  Upon cancelling the permit or license, the examiner of drivers shall notify the minor to surrender the permit or license.  If the death occurs after the minor has reached majority, this section shall not apply. [L 1967, c 214, pt of §2; HRS ; am L 1970, c 164, §3]
